select m.markname,p.score,m.markid from performence p left join mark m on p.markid = m.markid left join jobevaluation j on j.age = #{age} where p.studentid = #{studentid}
mapper.update: update jobevaluation set evaluation = #{evaluation} where studentid = #{studentid} and age = #{age}
